short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collects and displays Blinkit order statistics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blinkit Order Stats is a powerful Chrome extension that helps you understand your Blinkit ordering habits. Get a comprehensive breakdown of your orders, including total spend, order frequency, and more. Whether you want to track your spending or just curious about your ordering patterns, this extension has you covered.

Key Features:
• View statistics for the last 12 months or any specific year
• See total amount spent, number of orders, and average order value
• Analyze order distribution by hour, day of the week, and month
• Check your top 5 highest-value orders
• All data is processed locally for your privacy

How to use:
1. Click on the extension icon
2. Choose to view stats for the last year or select a specific year
3. The extension will navigate to your Blinkit order history and collect the data
4. View your personalized order statistics right in your browser

Privacy Note:
Your privacy is our top priority. All data is processed locally on your device. No information is collected, stored, or transmitted to any external servers.

Discover insights about your Blinkit orders today with Blinkit Order Stats!
